description:
After initial app load, prefetch knowledge base list metadata and stats in the background using Next.js's prefetch or a low-priority fetch. Store in React Context or state manager to instantly populate KB selection dropdowns when users navigate to solve/research agents.

**Rationale:** KB selection is required for most agent workflows, but users often wait 200-500ms for the dropdown to load after opening solve/research pages. Prefetching this lightweight metadata (typically <10KB) during idle time eliminates perceived latency when starting workflows.
title: Prefetch Critical Knowledge Base Metadata on App Load
